text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Asahi, I have good news today.
You won an award at a certain music program.
It's considered one of the pinnacles for new idols.
Pinnacle... does that mean it's amazing?

Oh, it's a big deal.
Congratulations, Asahi.
But I didn't do anything.

They evaluated various activities like released
songs, magazines, and TV appearances.
Oh...
Can I be happy about it?

Asahi's hard work in lessons and handling
many jobs was recognized.

Oh, I see.
I see what you mean.

Right!
I'll be happy!
Haha, yeah...

Well, I can't just be happy all the time...
Since we won, we'll have to appear on a special program.

Not only the ratings but also the attention within the industry
is highâ”€we have to hurry with the preparations.
Huh? Can't I just be happy?

Oops, sorry. There are things we have to do,
but for today, let's celebrate.
Haha, what are we going to do?
